title: shared file (with all the permissions) can't be moved
body:
### expected behaviour
file should be moved

### actual behaviour
file can't be moved

### steps to reproduce
1.	there are two users in the server (user1 and user2)
2.	log in owncloud as user1:
	* on the root upload a file and call it: doc.pdf
3.	share the file called "doc.pdf" with all (update, delete and share) permission with user2.
4.	log in as user2
5.	now using webdav protocol, move a file called "doc.pdf" which is inside folder "shared" to root. â€¨notice that you have the right permission to do this.

	we are going to see do it using poster (complement in firefox) (screenshot is attached)

        * url:server/remote.php/webdav/shared/doc.pdf

        * user: user2 

        * password:

        * action:move

        * headers

              - destination: server/remote.php/webdav/doc.pdf

              - overwrite: t


![screen shot 2013-10-29 at 9 40 24 am 2](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/4538201/1426752/3a72e78e-4076-11e3-9a6c-fce3d7c80997.png)




6. an 403 error is shown when it shouldn't because the file has all the permissions, so it should be moved

### server configuration

using daily instance (http://daily.owncloud.com/master/owncloud)

owncloud version: {"installed":"true","version":"6.0.0.2","versionstring":"6.0 beta 1","edition":""}

### client configuration
browser: firefox
operating system: maos 10.7.5
